text: North and Middle Andaman district is one of the 3 districts of the Indian Union Territory of Andaman and Nicobar Islands in the Bay of Bengal. Mayabunder town is the district headquarters. The area covered by this district is 3251.85 km2. ==Demographics== According to the 2011 census North and Middle Andaman district has a population of 105,539, roughly equal to the nation of Tonga. This gives it a ranking of 614th in India (out of a total of 640). The district has a population density of . Its population growth rate over the decade 2001-2011 was -0.07%. North And Middle Andaman has a sex ratio of 925 females for every 1000 males, and a literacy rate of 84.25%. The majority of the population of this district are Bengalis. ==References== ==Other websites== *North and Middle Andaman district official website Category:Districts of the Andaman and Nicobar Islands
title: North and Middle Andaman district
